backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a pricing-section update and its related file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and dark theme variable definitions with OKLCH color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing header and all marketing sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive header with branding, smooth-scroll navigation, and mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Scroll: Utility for smooth scrolling to section anchors with header offset.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: All marketing sections including hero, services, process, pricing with $50 deposit note, example, about, and contact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThemeT: Centralized constants for spacing, container sizing, gradients, and neon shadow presets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables, base typography, neon utility classes, and custom scrollbars for a dark neon theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom OKLCH-based colors, animations, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, including existing features and a pending request to add a $50 deposit note under pricing plans.
